text: Aur eman walon aur nek amal kerney walon ko unn jannaton ki khushkhabriyan do jin kay neechay nehren beh rahi hain. Jab kabhi woh phalon ka rizq diye jayen gay aur hum shakal laye jayen gay to kahen gay yeh wohi hain jo hum iss say pehlay diye gaye thay aur unn kay liye biwiyan hain saaf suthri aur unn jannaton mein hamesha rehney walay hain
